title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly when the font size is modified.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.
2. Observe that the height of the label does not change to accommodate the new font size.
